issue.title: [R] Support dplyr::compute()
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11754](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11754). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Consider using a `compute()` method to force computation of lazy ops, instead of using `collect(as_data_frame = FALSE)`.

See discussion at <https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9521#discussion_r581367505>

Also see <https://github.com/tidyverse/dplyr/pull/5783>

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11754?focusedCommentId=17316780) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9927
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9927>
